title: Challenges and industrial considerations towards stable and high-energy-density aqueous zinc-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03628J, Review Article
Yida Hu, Peiyuan Wang, Mingzhu Li, Zhexuan Liu, Shuquan Liang, Guozhao Fang
This review provides a guidance from lab cells to industrial stable and high-energy-density pouch cells in terms of high areal capacity, a low negative capacity/positive capacity ratio, a low electrolyte mass/capacity ratio and industrial concerns.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
